scripts.server.lemon: serverless offline start --profile lemon --env lemon.yml --stage local --port 8888
scripts.server.ssocio: serverless offline start --profile ssocio --env ssocio.yml --stage local --port 8888
scripts.!express: ----- 로컬/개발 서버에서 express로 안정적으로 돌리기 위함 -----
scripts.!pm2: ----- run pm2 process with command line -----
scripts.pm2.lemon: ENV=lemon STAGE=local pm2 start express.js --name hello-api --watch -- --port 8888
scripts.pm2.ssocio: ENV=ssocio STAGE=local pm2 start express.js --name hello-api --watch -- --port 8888
scripts.!deploy: ----- gulp 빌드후 dist 폴더에 압축한 다음, serverless를 통해서 deploy 실행 -----
scripts.deploy.lemon: gulp && sls deploy --profile lemon --env lemon.yml --stage prod
scripts.deploy.ssocio: gulp && sls deploy --profile ssocio --env ssocio.yml --stage prod
scripts.!logs: ----- print logs of serverless by profile -----
scripts.logs.lemon: sls logs --profile lemon --env lemon.yml --stage prod -t --startTime 5m -f hello
scripts.logs.ssocio: sls logs --profile ssocio --env ssocio.yml --stage prod -t --startTime 5m -f hello
